column1: The introductory module will discuss the basic knowledge of mental health and related issues.
This module continues to explore mental health in theoretical and practical settings.
This module will provide students with a solid grounding in psychopharmacotherapy, as applied to mental health care.
This module will provide students with a solid grounding in psychological intervention, as applied to mental health care.

During the two year period of the MSc course, students will carry out a research project in the field of mental health studies under the supervision of a supervisor assigned by the course directors. Each student will spend a minimum of four contact hour per week with the supervisor.
During the two year period of the MSC course, students will carry out a research project under supervision.
